verses.verse: Brethren, <S%G80><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> a man <S%G444><s%> is caught <S%G4301><s%> in any <S%G5100><s%> trespass, <S%G3900><s%> you who are spiritual, <S%G4152><s%> restore <S%G2675><s%> such <S%G5108><s%> a one <S%G5108><s%> in a spirit <S%G4151><s%> of gentleness; <S%G4240><s%> [each one] looking <S%G4648><s%> to yourself, <S%G4572><s%> lest <S%G3361><s%> you too <S%G2532><s%> be tempted. <S%G3985><s%>
Bear <S%G941><s%> one <S%G240><s%> another's burdens, <S%G922><s%> and thus <S%G3779><s%> fulfill <S%G378><s%> the law <S%G3551><s%> of Christ. <S%G5547><s%>
For if <S%G1487><s%> anyone <S%G5100><s%> thinks <S%G1380><s%> he is something <S%G5100><s%> when he is nothing, <S%G3367><s%> he deceives <S%G5422><s%> himself. <S%G1438><s%>

But let each <S%G1538><s%> one <S%G1538><s%> examine <S%G1381><s%> his own <S%G1438><s%> work, <S%G2041><s%> and then <S%G5119><s%> he will have <S%G2192><s%> [reason for] boasting <S%G2745><s%> in regard <S%G1519><s%> to himself <S%G1438><s%> alone, <S%G3441><s%> and not in regard <S%G1519><s%> to another. <S%G2087><s%>
For each <S%G1538><s%> one <S%G1538><s%> shall bear <S%G941><s%> his own <S%G2398><s%> load. <S%G5413><s%>
And let the one who is taught <S%G2727><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> share <S%G2841><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> good <S%G18><s%> things <S%G18><s%> with him who teaches. <S%G2727><s%>

Do not be deceived, <S%G4105><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> is not mocked; <S%G3456><s%> for whatever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G1437><s%> a man <S%G444><s%> sows, <S%G4687><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> he will also <S%G2532><s%> reap. <S%G2325><s%>

For the one who sows <S%G4687><s%> to his own <S%G1438><s%> flesh <S%G4561><s%> shall from the flesh <S%G4561><s%> reap <S%G2325><s%> corruption, <S%G5356><s%> but the one who sows <S%G4687><s%> to the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> shall from the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> reap <S%G2325><s%> eternal <S%G166><s%> life. <S%G2222><s%>

And let us not lose <S%G7051><s%> heart <S%G7051><s%> in doing <S%G4160><s%> good, <S%G2570><s%> for in due <S%G2398><s%> time <S%G2540><s%> we shall reap <S%G2325><s%> if we do not grow <S%G1590><s%> weary. <S%G1590><s%>

So <S%G686><s%> then, <S%G686><s%> while <S%G5613><s%> we have <S%G2192><s%> opportunity, <S%G2540><s%> let us do <S%G2038><s%> good <S%G18><s%> to all <S%G3956><s%> men, <S%G3956><s%> and especially <S%G3122><s%> to those <S%G3588><s%> who <S%G3609><s%> are of the household <S%G3609><s%> of the faith. <S%G4102><s%>
See <S%G3708><s%> with what <S%G4080><s%> large <S%G4080><s%> letters <S%G1121><s%> I am writing <S%G1125><s%> to you with my own <S%G1699><s%> hand. <S%G5495><s%>

Those <S%G3745><s%> who <S%G3745><s%> desire <S%G2309><s%> to make <S%G2146><s%> a good <S%G2146><s%> showing <S%G2146><s%> in the flesh <S%G4561><s%> try to compel <S%G315><s%> you to be circumcised, <S%G4059><s%> simply <S%G3440><s%> that they may not be persecuted <S%G1377><s%> for the cross <S%G4716><s%> of Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

For those <S%G3588><s%> who are circumcised <S%G4059><s%> do not even <S%G3761><s%> keep <S%G5442><s%> the Law <S%G3551><s%> themselves, <S%G846><s%> but they desire <S%G2309><s%> to have you circumcised, <S%G4059><s%> that they may boast <S%G2744><s%> in your flesh. <S%G4561><s%>

But may it never <S%G3361><s%> be that I should boast, <S%G2744><s%> except <S%G1508><s%> in the cross <S%G4716><s%> of our Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> the world <S%G2889><s%> has been crucified <S%G4717><s%> to me, and I to the world. <S%G2889><s%>
For neither <S%G3777><s%> is circumcision <S%G4061><s%> anything, <S%G5100><s%> nor <S%G3777><s%> uncircumcision, <S%G203><s%> but a new <S%G2537><s%> creation. <S%G2937><s%>

And those <S%G3745><s%> who <S%G3745><s%> will walk <S%G4748><s%> by this <S%G3778><s%> rule, <S%G2583><s%> peace <S%G1515><s%> and mercy <S%G1656><s%> [be] upon them, and upon the Israel <S%G2474><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

From now <S%G3062><s%> on let no <S%G3367><s%> one <S%G3367><s%> cause <S%G3930><s%> trouble <S%G2873><s%> for me, for I bear <S%G941><s%> on my body <S%G4983><s%> the brand-marks of Jesus. <S%G2424><s%>
The grace <S%G5485><s%> of our Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> be with your spirit, <S%G4151><s%> brethren. <S%G80><s%> Amen. <S%G281><s%>
